hackathon-description-text: Rice University's annual hackathon is back!
hackathon-eligibility: Confirmed HackRice 2015 attendees may make a ChallengePost submission. Submissions should be one per project. Alumni may also submit a submission, but it will not be eligible for judging and prizes.
hackathon-requirements: The following items will be expected for the submission:
hackathon-rules: HackRice will officially kick off at 01:00 PM on Saturday, January 31, 2015. We will provide tables, power strips, food, caffeine, and hourly raffle prizes to keep you awake. To be eligible for prizes, your submission must:

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Have you seen a project
like this before? How
innovative is the solution?

How technically
impressive is the project?

Does this project have
important implications?
Would this project be
used outside the
hackathon?

How refined is the idea,
UI, and overall
presentation?
